abstract: Preface,.- 1 Introduction to Hybrid Logic.- 2 Proof-Theory of Propositional Hybrid Logic .- 3 Tableaus and Decision Procedures for Hybrid Logic .- 4 Comparison to Seligman's Natural Deduction System .- 5 Functional Completeness for a Hybrid Logic .- 6 First-Order Hybrid.- 7 Intensional First-Order Hybrid Logic.- 8 Intuitionistic Hybrid Logic.- 9 Labelled Versus Internalized Natural Deduction .- 10 Why does the Proof-Theory of Hybrid Logic Behave soWell? - References .- Index.
